price: 40 afin que nous restions attachés à la religion des magiciens, s’ils sortent vainqueurs de cette confrontation. »
arabic: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: laʿallanā nattabiʿu al-saḥarata in kānū humu al-ghālibīna
